name: Prize Claw Halloween HD
description:
You've played through PRIZE CLAW HD, now try a new season of fun! With PRIZE CLAW HALLOWEEN HD, a whole host of new prizes, powers and puzzle pieces will fill your themed machines to the brim. Brand new claws make the prize-grabbing action feel new again, and with each holiday-themed puzzle piece you'll remember all the claw games you played as a kid.

Just like the original, you'll get the chance to grab coins and gems, but PRIZE CLAW HALLOWEEN features all new prizes, along with fancy new frames for the latest puzzle pieces. Holiday-themed machines and joysticks spruce up your prize-catching space as well! The new prizes can be traded in for special bonuses, and each of the all-new missions has a different reward! Don't worry about running out of grabs! You'll always receive more. And as the seasons change, new claw machines, complete with new claws, joysticks and missions will be added!

Features:
--40 all new prizes to collect!
--New ways to customize your machine, including new claws and joysticks!
--A special, holiday-themed puzzle!
--Tons of missions to hone your skills!
--Earn daily bonuses!
--More holiday themed machines coming soon!
